coreAtributes.name: Saiyan Armour
coreAtributes.description: A set of Saiyan Armour, power level optional.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull off your Saiyan Armour and drop it next to your feet.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull off [npc.name]'s Saiyan Armour and drop it at [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Saiyan Armour and roughly pull it off [npc.her] before dropping it at [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls off [npc.her] Saiyan Armour and drops it next to [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls off your Saiyan Armour and drops it at your feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Saiyan Armour and roughly pulls it off, before dropping it next to you.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls off [npc2.name]'s Saiyan Armour and drops it next to [npc2.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Saiyan Armour and roughly pulls it off, before dropping it at [npc2.her] feet.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on your Saiyan Armour.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull the Saiyan Armour down onto [npc.her].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly pull the Saiyan Armour onto [npc.her].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls the Saiyan Armour down onto you.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly pulls the Saiyan Armour onto you.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls the Saiyan Armour down over [npc2.name]'s head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pulls the Saiyan Armour onto [npc2.her].
